text: Several companies with Kushner connections appear to be benefitting from Trump administration policies. Donors & golf club members are whispering in the president’s ear. But the White House won’t even release the names of the “advisors” making these backroom deals & decisions.

Today I announced the VoteSafe Act. It includes:
→$2.5 billion to expand vote-by-mail and early voting
→$2.5 billion to improve safety of polling places
→No-excuse mail-in absentee voting
→At least 20 days of early voting 

Voting is a fundamental right. We must protect it.

We need the Oversight Commission to make sure relief funds are directly supporting workers⁠—not wealthy CEOs and investors.

My friend @BharatRamamurti is right: Congress needs to fill the commission now so it can get to work. https://twitter.com/BharatRamamurti/status/1250764444319256583 QT @BharatRamamurti The Fed is set to lend out trillions of dollars to big business. Will that money help support workers or mostly flow to executives and investors? That’s the key question for the Oversight Commission. 

Here’s my op-ed in NYT this morning on that question:

https://www.nytimes.com/2020/04/16/opinion/coronavirus-oversight-congress-trillions.html

No voter should ever have to make the choice between staying healthy and casting their ballot. I urge Congress to swiftly pass my VoteSafe Act.
https://twitter.com/jamilsmith/status/1250808138514657286 QT @JamilSmith “This is about making sure that in our country, no one should have to decide about their right to vote versus their health.” @KamalaHarris spoke exclusively with me about her new VoteSafe Act of 2020. Read about it now in my report for @RSPolitics. https://trib.al/7RH82Fh

Earlier today, I announced my new bill to confront the barriers to voting that are being magnified by the pandemic. The VoteSafe Act will authorize $5 billion to:

-require universal early voting
-expand vote-by-mail
-ensure safe & accessible in-person voting to those who need it
I’ll be live with @MileyCyrus’s #BrightMinded show on Instagram at 2:30pm ET. Hope you’ll tune in!

I just announced a plan to ensure everyone is protected when they cast their ballot in November. Be the first to hear what this plan entails, coming up on @craigmelvin on @MSNBC next.
